name: Battle Jango
description:
2 Player game of Battle Jango. Objective: Knock down 20 blocks from the opponent's tower. 2 players take turns sharing a single device.

Controls:

Camera:
Arrow keys left, right: Turn the camera.
Scroll wheel: Zoom in and out.

Obtain block phase:
Left-click and drag to move a block. Faster movements usually lead to stronger moves.
Holding the right-click you can charge a push and release to push the selected block.

Shoot phase:
Space key to confirm angle and space key again to fire.


Credits:

Game By: Kirblee, SpicyBoio, Bones
Smoke Shader By: arlez80 https://godotshaders.com/shader/smoke-shader/

This game was made for GWJ#49
